name: Nandemoya of Flower Street
description:
Introduction

You are an assassin with extraordinary skills. live in seclusion in an inconspicuous mansion on Flower Street and work in the Nandemoya. Your life is actually pretty good by yourself, but the little sister next door comes to visit you all day long. You are a legendary assassin, you originally dismissed the girl's request, but...so big! This little sister's breasts are really big!

Entrustment


The well -known contemporary talented girl were stolen by the underworld because of important works. The quiet appearance is hidden in the dangerous real character.


The wealthy lady, who is very easy to be shy, She wanted to find out the reason for being left out of her husband, but detonated the desire for a long time.


The premier chief dancer in the city is proud and beautiful. Many people wait in line to see her, threatened by death and ask for help.

Gameplay


Although "Nandemoya of Flower Street" has nearly 100,000 words of story, it is essentially a strategy game. In terms of combat, it pays special attention to the arrangement and use of skills. Skills are divided into four types. You can get new sSkills and equipments by completing entrusts.Free to create your own fighting style.
For players who don't want to think and just want to play sex, the game has also prepared a "simple mode" very intimately. Just press the automatic battle to pass the level easily. The players who are eager to challenge are recommended to carry out the Hard mode to fully experience the fun brought by the combat system.

Game Features

  • Dynamic CG
  • Rich storyline
  • Female characters with different personalities
  • Matching Skills
  • Exciting strategic battles
  • Some Japanese dubbing


(Texts in languages other than Chinese and English are temporarily translated mechanically)
